metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8364 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The read_buf function in stream.c in rzip 2.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted archive. Agostino Sarubbo discovered that rzip has a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker could use this issue to cause a DoS or possibly execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8364` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rzip - 2.1-4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rzip package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1-4.1').
